unnormalised: Wishing a speedy recovery to Virat, hope he's back on the field soon! Any update on Bumrah's hamstring? Crucial for the upcoming series against Australia. Let's hope the NCA physios are on top of things. His absence was felt during the Asia Cup. Remember Chak De! India, team spirit is vital. Sources say he's doing 5 km runs daily. Also, what about Hardik's back? These injuries can be tricky. The BCCI needs to keep fans informed.
